markdownRemark.html:
Kevin Richardson’s bond with animals always leave me speechless. He created a sanctuary for lions and hyenas in South Africa and creates a unique position for us all human beings - co-exist with wild animals in their natural habitat.

Alex Hanold ascent in El Capitan is beyond comprehension. He climbed a 3000 meter vertical mountain without any rope or tools - just bare hands..

Elon Musk combines all of the world’s most cutting edge technology available to solve the burdens of the future - AI, Climate Change and Space Exploration.

These are people whom I try to observe a lot. Extraordinary ones who try to push the boundaries of how we humans operate. They exist and are alive in our lifetime. They give a jolt of energy & excitement to me whenever I see their accomplishments. Makes me proud that we are of the same genus.

But..

There are also people that pushed evil in this world that no matter how much good we all do - we won’t be able to erase them. ISIS still rape women in Syria and Iraq. Venezuela is disintegrating. Democratic Republic of Congo is damaged tremendously by corruption.
